meanings.definition: The hard outer covering of a marine mollusk.
meanings.sent1: I collected seashells on the shore during my vacation.
meanings.sent2: The seashells were scattered along the sandy beach.
meanings.sent3: The seashells whispered stories of the ocean to me.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like seashells in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The seashells crunched under my feet as I walked.

meanings.definition: A shell found on the beach, typically used for decoration.
meanings.sent1: She painted seashells to create beautiful art pieces.
meanings.sent2: Children love collecting seashells to bring home.
meanings.sent3: The seashells giggled as they were placed on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as bright as a seashell in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The seashells added a touch of the ocean to the room.

meanings.definition: A protective covering or casing, resembling a seashell.
meanings.sent1: The knight's armor was as strong as seashells.
meanings.sent2: The delicate jewelry box was shaped like seashells.
meanings.sent3: The seashells on the phone case made it unique.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed inside her seashell necklace.
meanings.sent5: The seashells shielded the tiny hermit crab inside.
